https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/wiki/faq

> .., if OpenBLAS was compiled with threading support (USE_THREAD=1 by default), custom programs statically linked against libopenblas.a should also link to the pthread library 

with default to `True`.

Similar to `atlas`, it would provide two shared memory parallelisation options: pthreads or openmp.
title: add `pthread` variant to openblas
